text: Exposé is an American pop-rock group. The group was formed in 1984. Members of the group included Ann Curless, Jeanette Jurado and Gioia Bruno. They had success in the late 1980s and early 1990s. Exposé are the first music group to have four top 10 hit songs on the Billboard Hot 100. The group have had over 25 million records worldwide. == Albums == * Exposure (1987) * What You Don't Know (1989) * Exposé (1992) Category:1980s music groups Category:1990s music groups Category:American pop music groups Category:American girl groups Category:Musical groups established in 1984 Category:Musical groups from Miami
title: Exposé (group)
